website_summaries.verdict: Three versatile sizes in a pack of nine with a price that falls on the lower end of the spectrum. Practical, despite some durability concerns.
pros: Set of 9 that includes 3 different color-coded sizes
Clean easily when washed by hand
cons: Some users wish they were a bit more transparent, and others complained of produce stored in them spoiling prematurely
Not quite as durable as pricier options

customer_reviews.title: Works and keeps my crisper drawers in fridge clean
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my sweet potatoes, apples and other fruit to store in my fridge. Beats using plastic bags and keeps drawers clean. Got so sick of onions, potatoes, etc that would shed outm of their mesh bags and leave a mess in the crisper drawers. No more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps produce fresher longer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience switching out plastic for reusable. After I finally remembered to pack these bags with my shopping bags kept in the car, I haven't gone back to using the plastic ones. The tare is indeed written on the bags themselves. So weighing is easy (especially if you're shopping on your own/scanning and weighing your own produce). Once home, I placed every veggie and fruit in the fridge in one of these bags. They DEFINITELY have stayed fresher/crisper/heartier longer than before. I was happily surprised. Washing them is easy too, although hardly any residue on them because the food inside hasn't spoiled. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ar4w

customer_reviews.title: These produce bags are a must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these produce bags! as we all know the produce bags at the grocery store are the biggest waste of plastic ever... nobody ever even reuses those! All the different sizes are perfect, I just shove them all into the largest bag and bring them with me, washable, breathable... Wish I would have bought these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jess11

customer_reviews.title: So Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I take these to the grocery store, and I use them for all produce and fruit. I dump the plastic containers out into the bags, and I give the plastic back to them at checkout and ask them to quit packaging in it! I bring them home and wash everything in the bags, then lay them on a towel to drain, and I store everything right in the bag in the fridge! Love these. I am buying more for my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Twynkle

customer_reviews.title: Great produce bags
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should buy a set of these and stop using those awful, NON-RECYCLABLE plastic bags you get at the grocery store produce section. They do not compost!!! Use these, they are breathable, do not add any weight to your produce when checking out, and a snap to use. Highly recommend them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Maureen D.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are easy to stuff your fruits and vegetables into. No problem with checkout at the grocery store. You can read the codes thru the bag. I get asked at the store frequently where I got them. Easy to wash also
customer_reviews.author: traveler530

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have thought !!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes shopping for veggies and fruit so much simpler! You just take the bag with you and put your produce in and go. I don't think you can mix things, such as cucumbers and carrots in one bag. Only one item in each bag. When we get home we just take the bag out and put in the sink under some water. And depending on what it is open the bag first and put veggie and fruit cleaner on it first. Absolutely love this product and highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Mueller

customer_reviews.title: i use these for hand washed clothing items in the washing machine!
customer_reviews.text: the clip stays closed in the washing machine. there are a couple sizes. the small ones are good for panties and socks. the other 2 sizes are good for the dry clean only or silks that are hand wash only, on gentle in the washing machine. i washed a medium size dress with silk, rhinestones, and sequins in the large bag and absolutely nothing fell off in the washing machine on the gentle cycle. i was amazed!!
customer_reviews.author: tim miller

customer_reviews.title: STOP using those plastic produce bags that just get thrown away.
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT. The close up easily, light weight, washable appear to be reusable for a lifetime. They should be selling these in the grocery stores right in the produce department. Pick a plastic bag or a reusable bag?
customer_reviews.author: Hula Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these little bags so much I am going to order more. I love that I don’t have to use those plastic bags at the store only to bring them home and toss them. They are easily portable and washed. Everyone that sees them asks where I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ott

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reusable.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very useful. The plastic bags at the store are in shreds before I make it home. These are roomy, sturdy, and reusable.
customer_reviews.author: NanaB

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased these, they are as described. Easier to use than the disposable plastic ones. Did not try to deal with having the cashier take off the tare weight since, to me, they are so light.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good bags with very nice quality of mesh. They are completely washable in the washing machine. And the best part about these bags is that they come in different sizes
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I hate using the small plastic bags for produce at the grocery store, so these are an excellent alternative.
customer_reviews.author: JessB

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the multiple sizes and durability so far. I am happy I am helping reduce our carbon foot print a bit in this way. I enjoy the larger size bags for putting away smaller kids toys like balls, doll clothes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda & John C

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for this produce buying family!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, well made and just what I thought I was buying......I'll buy more and share with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie Jude

customer_reviews.title: Earth friendly shopping
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with these bags. No more plastic produce bags blocking air circulation in the fridge. Easy to see what is in the bag. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzseamom

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect sizes. Plenty big and sturdy. I like that the sizes are color coordinated. Saves me probably 5-10 produce bags a trip.
customer_reviews.author: BluFenderStrat07

customer_reviews.title: Great mesh produce bags
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mesh bags for my vegetables and fruit. I was inspired to be a little more ‘green’ and these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Krista J.

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They are perfect for storing fruit in the fridge. You can wash your fruit in the bag. I love that.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So good i bought them twice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to save the planet. Found that they are so versatile, a starter-pack isn't enough - so i bought more. They're pretty durable so I expect years of use.. and I'm setting an example for my kiddo. Plastic is poison. FWIW the mesh is fine enough to hold rice from the bulk bin.. Super loving that.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew about these a long time ago. They're not only great for at home but also to take to the grocery store so you don't have to use plastic. And they are very durable and also collar accorded to make it very easy to distinguish vegetables and fruits in the bag for my children.
customer_reviews.author: anthony markowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sizes
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for- cosmetic & vitamin storage as well as shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have tried to reduce our plastic and these work great for grocery shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Tobler-Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Convince at your fingertips!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so convenient and easy to use! I thinks it's a wonderful idea. I can put the produce in the bag and rinse them then just put them in the fridge! No more plastic containers taking up space in the produce drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Iocca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect produce bags!
customer_reviews.text: Great bags- exactly what I needed!! Don’t take up a lot of space but sturdy material and a variety of sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Scannell

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic bags
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I take them with me whenever I go shopping to pack my produce and anything else that is otherwise loose. They are washable, the various sizes are great, and they are durable and practical. Drawstring closes them up tight. Simple and irreplaceable.
customer_reviews.author: T P

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags to use as produce bags when i go grocery shopping. I love them! If you are trying to cut down on plastic bags I would 100% recommend. They are very well made and they are very easy to clean. Plus I love that these come in different sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Rubi C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for fruits and vegetables.
customer_reviews.text: Like never using single plastic bags again! Easy to take to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice produce bags.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, good quantity for the price. I really like them, seem like they’ll last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell but so far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far these bags seem durable. I do like the number of bags that come with the order. I definitely feel I have enough to handle the amount of produce I buy/consume as a single person. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Not only can you store produce in them, you can use them for camping. Wet swimsuits, beach toys etc. will store nicely in these bags during the summer. Durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Designrox77

customer_reviews.title: Fresher produce
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I love to organize my produce in the refrigerator and this product allows me to do so and it seems they stay fresher longer as well. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Mills

customer_reviews.title: Durable and they have tare weight tags
customer_reviews.text: I have to say a lot of reviews said there is no tare weight tags but I have them. Very easy to use, strings seem pretty durable on the ones I have used last night. I can see a multi purpose use for these I love em!
customer_reviews.author: Ajani Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Mostly worth it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and wash. Only downside is I haven’t found a grocery store that can remove the weight of the bag when they weigh my produce, so I’m being charged extra with every purchase that goes on the scale.
customer_reviews.author: Frisky

customer_reviews.title: Silicone nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I hate these! Very difficult to use, not good for most things I wanted to store in them. Plastic zipper is useless
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Williams

customer_reviews.title: Tons of uses
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great!! They have 1001 uses. The smallest ones are great for grapes, cherries etc I throw a serving size in the bag, wash/rinse them then tie the bag to the faucet in the sink. The next morning everything is dry and goes in the lunch boxes, bag and all.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Good bye plastic produce bags!
customer_reviews.text: Very please with these! I love the weight label.. clever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! It's so easy to h wash your produce and store it in these bags. I really liked it especially for smaller fruits!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Using less one time use plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for grocery shopping and for produce shopping at the farmers market. These would be great for sand toys to and from the beach and keeping bath toys in.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for most items, but could be longer
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags for produce, but they are a little too short to hold some items like butter lettuce. To be most versatile, I'd like to see them made about 4 inches longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got plastic? 😏
customer_reviews.text: Every little bit helps the earth, the sea and the creatures that call them home. Plus, these are so much better than keeping your produce in crappy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Keri R

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable bag
customer_reviews.text: As a vegan I love these reusable bags for all my produce I purchase weekly. They are great to take to the store and use for your produce to reduce plastic bag use. Love how you can wash the produce in the bags. Would def recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Coon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product - no longer use single use plastic bags while shopping.
customer_reviews.author: mara c. stephan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy mesh produce bags
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mesh bags for produce and beach trips with the family. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smyth

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Heavier then I expected. But appreciate the Tare weight being on the tab. Fast shipping! Arrived in 24 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Butler

customer_reviews.title: Clean and fresh!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags were very useful in keeping my produce fresh, organized in my fridge and clean up very well. I was impressed and will be purchasing some for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great for the weight
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is they do have some weight to them
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Olan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the planet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protect to use while grocery shopping instead of those plastic bags. It’s also great for the planet!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa errington

customer_reviews.title: Great bags in even better sizes
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves these bags. She uses them daily for all our fruits and vegetables since we just started juicing recently. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Produce bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags for my produce. People at the store always ask where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: LisaH

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Really great for washing fruit, especially grapes so they don’t fall down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: C Bernardi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a couple of months now and absolutely love them. The varying sizes work for any type of produce, they are easy to wash, and dry quickly. The cashiers at my grocery store can easily peek inside to check produce numbers if needed and they weigh next to nothing. Most of all, I feel so much better about not having to use all those plastic produce bags just to get my food home. The bags are breathable, so I store some of my produce right in the bag in the frig- super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these bags. The fabric is flimsy and very light weight. When holding fruits and vegetables, it needs to be strong. The colored trim around the top of the bags have holes where the cord comes through. These holes are not reinforced. After pulling the strings a couple of times, the fabric already started to show wear. The black cord stoppers did not hold the cord in place. The bags were very easy to open while the cord was locked.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not good for groceries but for camping.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are not useful for groceries as you cannot scan through them. It's too cumbersome for the cashier to have to take the item out, scan it and put back in. People waiting in line behind not very happy. Good for camping though.
customer_reviews.author: Doodoo

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are there enough different sizes to take care of most of our produce shopping, but they actually work extremely well as storage bags in the fridge, too! Produce just seems to last longer in these than when they are stored in plastic bags. They wash well, but I let them air dry. I ordered another set so I have enough for shopping AND storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Strong

customer_reviews.title: These Are Great
customer_reviews.text: These mesh produce bags are great! I take them shopping with me and leave the produce in the bag when i get home. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: I love these little bags. I try to minimize the amount of plastic I use at the grocery but the produce section was always a challenge. Now, I can bag all of my produce in reusable bags. I've also noticed that cashier's have no trouble running up the produce either, despite the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Those bag are strong, sturdy, resistant, light, washable
customer_reviews.text: I bought those reusable bag to go shopping for vegetables, to reduce the amount of new plastic bags I used. I feel good about it. The Future will show us that "less is more" especially is matters regarding pollution
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline F. Wos

customer_reviews.title: Mesh vegetables bags
customer_reviews.text: 9 mesh vegetable bags with draw strings. 15” deep 12” wide. Great when going to shopping stores that require you to bag your own groceries then ready to but bag in refrigerator. Washable. Excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Best Environmentally Friendly Purchase Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags, these are the perfect bags to use for produce shopping. They are light mesh, and don’t crush anything. Durable and very easy to clean plus reusable. I got these bags because I care about the environment and it feels good buying these bags instead of using the cheap plastic ones at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Twiztid_Skarcrow

customer_reviews.title: Great relpacement for plastic
customer_reviews.text: Always felt guilty about tossing those plastic bags I get at the grocery for fruits and vegetables. Now I just take these to the grocery and bring home, wash and store all in the same bag,
customer_reviews.author: JimM

customer_reviews.title: My Review
customer_reviews.text: I needed a few produce bags to replace the plastic ones in the store and this is the ones needed. The size is just right. Plenty strong. lightweight. I will post more after time.
customer_reviews.author: Keithmj

customer_reviews.title: so necessary
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled to have these and stop the single use plastic epidemic. I suggest you get a set. YES!
customer_reviews.author: John Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Not really sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but I was disappointed that one bag already has a tear in it after about six usages. Also, on several of the bags the little plastic pull that draws the bag closed have fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: Eydie Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great for produce. Keep them in your car, so next time you go shopping you waste less plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Deeflaca

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are versatile and easy to clean, they also have the weight on the tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BB Brotrade Reusable Mesh Produce Bags-Washable Set of 10 Premium Bags. Transparent With Tare Weight on Tags for Shopping Storage,Toys Fruit and Vegetable one Size 11" X 13.5"
product_meta.description:
Size:Set of 10PCSSpecification Detail 

✧Ten different color-coded tags for easy sorting.

 

✧Tare Weight On Tags: save your times when you grocery shopping.

 

✧See Through: easy to find your stored produces.

 

✧Lightweight & Folding: place your bag straight into the fridge.

 

✧Washable,durable and reusable for grocery and storage.

 

✧Drawstring and pop-lock for convenient opening and closing.and

 

keeps everything secure inside the bags.

 

✧Mesh Produce Bags Great For A Variety of Items.grocery shopping,toys

 

storage.travel.beach shoes.cosmetics.luggage sets and more.

 

✧A great way to reduce our use of plastic and contribute to the environment in a positive way.

 
Package included 

10pcs Mesh Produce Bags
feature_bullets: 【SEE-THROUGH】Made of strong & lightweight see-through mesh polyester material make it easy to see what's inside the bag. Each bag measures 11" X 13.5".
【MULTI-COLOR】Set of total 10 Premium Reusable Mesh Produce Bags with Ten different color-coded tags for easy sorting and orgainzed your produce.
【FOLDABLE BREATHABLE】These mesh produce bags are breathable and easy to fold and store flat. washable dry on low heat or hang on dry.

【CONVENIENCE】Our mesh produce bags are completely see-through.Easy to see whats inside without open them. Each bag WEIGHS LESS THAN 0.6 OUNCE so they add very minimal weight when checking out.Drawstring is convenient for opening and closing.and keeps everything secure inside the bags.

【MULTI FUNCTIONAL】Versatile bag, great for storing travel items shoes, cosmetics, accessories, beach bags, luggage sets, summer tote bags, kids toy storage, toiletries. It’s a great alternative to plastic storage bags, and good for the environment.
